TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoadItemsEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供支援自訂分頁之 ASP.NET Mobile 控制項的事件資料。

span.span: Provides event data for ASP.NET mobile controls that support custom pagination.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別物件提供了多少項目，以載入視控制項的相關資訊的事件資料。The class object provides event data with information about how many items to load into the control on demand. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何事件呼叫函式`LoadNow`。The following code example demonstrates how the event calls the function `LoadNow`. 屬性會決定要加入至陣列繫結至清單的項目數。The property determines the number of items to be added to an array that is bound to a list. 若要查看此範例的效果，您必須檢視頁面，可以對分頁清單的裝置上。In order to see the effects of this example, you must view the page on a device that can paginate the list. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/cs/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/vb/default.aspx#1)]
